    EmCare.B7-B8-B9.DE03End consultationThe client has not been stabilised and the healthcare worker willend the consultation
    EmCare.B7-B8-B9.DE02Stabilised, continue consultationThe client has been stabilised and the healthcare worker will continue the consultation

name: valueset-consultation-status
title: Continue to Assess Sick Child
description: Codes representing possible values for the Provide an estimated age or estimated date of birth element
